test.name: Sign in - no user, no password

results.result: <ezUser container="ezUser"><![CDATA[ <form id="ezUser-signin-form" class="ezUser-form" onsubmit="return false"> <fieldset class="ezUser-fieldset"> <input id= "ezUser-username" tabindex = "3201" value = "" type = "text" class = "ezUser-text" onkeyup = "ezUser_keyUp(event)" size = "40" /> <label class="ezUser-label" for="ezUser-username">Username:</label> <input id= "ezUser-password" tabindex = "3202" value = "" type = "password" onfocus = "ezUser_passwordFocus(this)" class = "ezUser-text" onkeyup = "ezUser_keyUp(event)" size = "40" /> <label class="ezUser-label" for="ezUser-password">Password:</label> </fieldset> $template13
